Method Detail

registerSound

public static void registerSound(java.lang.String filename,
                                 int id)
Register an integer handle for a sound file.

Parameters:
filename - Path to the sound file in the assets folder.
id - The handle for this audio file

play

public static void play(int id)
Plays a sound.

Parameters:
id - The handle of the sound to be played.

play

public static void play(int id,
                        boolean loop)
Plays a sound but overrides its loop setting.

Parameters:
id - The handle of the sound to be played.
loop - Set this to true to loop the sound.

setVolume

public static void setVolume(int id,
                             float left,
                             float right)
Sets the volume for a sound.

Parameters:
id - The handle of the sound.
left - Volume of the left channel. 0 = no sound, 1 = max volume.
right - Volume of the right channel. 0 = no sound, 1 = max volume.

setLoop

public static void setLoop(int id,
                           boolean loop)
Sets a sound to loop.

Parameters:
id - The handle of the sound to be looped.
loop - Set this to true to loop the sound.

stop

public static void stop(int id)
Stops a sound.

Parameters:
id - The handle of the sound to be stopped.

stopAll

public static void stopAll()
Stops all playing sounds.

unloadSound

public static void unloadSound(int id)
Unloads a sound from memory.

Parameters:
id - The handle of the sound to be unloaded.

unloadAll

public static void unloadAll()
Unloads all sounds loaded by SoundManager.

release

public static void release()
Releases all resources the SoundManager is using. Call this at least once before shutting down your game.
